quote: It’s pouring, the trees are getting greener before my eyes, I love you. I’m almost afraid of the intensity of this happiness.
author: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: There are lines of yours I know by heart. There are scents of yours soaked in my skin.
author: Marilyn Hacker

quote: I see you in colors that don't exist.
author: Paul Matsumoto

quote: But my words become stained with your love. You occupy everything. You occupy everything.
author: Pablo Neruda
